name: Curse of the River of Death

levels.description: Stops attacking, Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</>; when attacked, deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to surrounding ground enemies and an additional <@ba.vup>{ep_damage_ratio:0%}</> ATK as <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis Damage</> (can only trigger once every <@ba.vup>{aoe_cd}</>s); if Elemental Injury is received while skill is active, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> until this skill ends
